SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Join our family of food lovers
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Reserve a table for your loved ones and create lasting memories
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Savor Family Moments at Our Table
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover delicious meals and create lasting memories in our warm, welcoming family restaurant
FEATURE_1_BODY: Book your family's table with just a few taps, ensuring a seamless dining experience for everyone.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Explore our specially curated menu for little ones, packed with nutritious and delicious options.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Access exclusive family meal packages and promotions to make dining out more affordable.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get real-time updates on wait times, helping you plan your visit during less busy hours.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Effortlessly organize and customize birthday celebrations for your loved ones with our in-app party planner.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Earn points with every visit and redeem them for free meals, making family outings even more rewarding.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our family restaurant app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I make a reservation through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Making a reservation is easy! Simply open the app, select 'Make a Reservation', choose your preferred date and time, enter the number of guests, and confirm. You'll receive a confirmation notification once your reservation is set.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I view the menu and prices on the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! Our full menu with up-to-date prices is available on the app. You can browse through appetizers, main courses, desserts, and daily specials with detailed descriptions and photos.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Does the app offer any loyalty rewards or discounts?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, we have a loyalty program integrated into the app. You earn points for every visit and order, which can be redeemed for discounts, free items, or special perks. Keep an eye on the 'Rewards' section for current offers and your point balance.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How can I provide feedback or report an issue with my order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We value your feedback! In the app, go to 'My Orders' and select the specific order. You'll find options to rate your experience or report an issue. Our customer service team will respond promptly to address any concerns.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is it possible to customize my order or note dietary restrictions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Certainly! When placing an order, you can add special instructions or modifications to any dish. There's also a section to note any allergies or dietary restrictions, ensuring our kitchen prepares your meal accordingly.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: We are open 7 days a week from 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM. Last orders are taken at 9:30 PM.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do you offer takeout or delivery services?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, we offer both takeout and delivery services. You can place your order through our app or by calling us directly.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: While reservations are not required, they are recommended for weekends and special occasions to ensure availability. You can easily make a reservation through our app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Do you cater to dietary restrictions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! We offer a variety of options for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary needs. Please inform our staff about any allergies or restrictions when ordering.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese on a toasted bun
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Homemade pasta with rich tomato sauce and savory meatballs
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Golden-fried chicken strips with choice of dipping sauce
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Assorted grilled vegetables with herb dressing
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Tender, slow-cooked ribs with our secret BBQ sauce
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Mini pizzas with choice of toppings for the little ones

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from families who love our restaurant and app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has made dining out with my kids so much easier! We can browse the menu, make reservations, and even order ahead. It's a game-changer for family mealtimes.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The family-friendly features are fantastic. My picky eaters can customize their meals, and the kids' activity section keeps them entertained while we wait. Highly recommend!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a grandparent, I appreciate how easy the app makes it to plan family gatherings. The large text option and simple interface are perfect for users of all ages.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_PRIMARY_TITLE: Savor the Taste of Family Tradition
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Experience Warm Hospitality and Delicious Home-Style Cooking
